The connectivity problems encountered after rebuilding Perian and On Prem can be attributed to limitations arising from the VPC ID. These limitations are a consequence of managing infrastructure in other accounts, which are being handled separately. Additionally, there is a strong interdependence between the resources of the domain team and the accounts they manage using Terraform. This issue is rooted in legacy systems and practices.other accounts using Terraform. This constraint is a legacy problem.
